Sentence.sentence: Colleges, for their part, have since 1985 graduated fewer chemical, mechanical, industrial and metallurgical (冶金的) engineers, partly in response to the reduced role of manufacturing, a big employer of them.

Sentence.sentence: In response to the embargo, the US government enforced a series of policies designed to reduce reliance on foreign oil

Sentence.sentence: He had read that speakers can be more persuasive if they invade the personal space of listeners, encouraging an emotional response.

Sentence.sentence: In the video clips, the babies made various facial expressions in response to real life events including playful interactions and painful ones.

Sentence.sentence: So far, the main thing many large retailers have done in response to all this is to open online stores, so people will come to them directly rather than to Amazon and its smaller online rivals.

Sentence.sentence: This is a grand challenge for our age and it may require an "irrational" response.

stems_affixes.word_buile: despond[v.失望]+ent……的→adj.失望的,意气消沉的
spont=spond承诺,允诺+aneous……的→自内心的承诺

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通信,信件;[with]符合;[to]相当于,对应
stems_affixes.word_buile: correspond[v.通信;符合]+ence表名词→n.通信,信件;[with]符合;[to]相当于,对应

stems_affixes.value_cn: 被告;回答者;反应; 反射
stems_affixes.word_buile: respond[v.回答,响应,作出反应]+ent……的→回答的人→被告
respond[[v.回答,响应,作出反应]]省鷑.回答,响应,反应
cor共同+respond反应→共同反应→相互通信
de去掉+spond承诺,允诺→不再承诺→失望
re回+spond承诺,允诺→承诺回去→回答

entry.def: Your response to an event or to something that is said is your reply or reaction to it.

example.ex: There has been no response to his remarks from the government...
example.tran: 政府尚未对他的言论作出回应。

example.ex: Your positive response will reinforce her actions...
example.tran: 你积极的回应会使她的行为更加坚定。

sentences.sentence: "this situation developed in response to events in Africa"

means.word_mean: 2. a bodily process occurring due to the effect of some foregoing stimulus or agent;
3. a statement (either spoken or written) that is made in reply to a question or request or criticism or accusation;

sentences.sentence: "I waited several days for his answer"
"he wrote replies to several of his critics"

means.word_mean: 4. the manner in which something is greeted;

sentences.sentence: "she did not expect the cold reception she received from her superiors"

means.word_mean: 5. a phrase recited or sung by the congregation following a versicle by the priest or minister
6. the speech act of continuing a conversational exchange;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French respons or Latin responsum 'something offered in return', neuter past participle of respondere (see respond)

sentences.cn: “我只看到火光, ”她低语回答.
sentences.en: I only watch the sparks, he murmurs in response.

sentences.cn: 以下是我对C夫人所提问题以及她的回答和自发性联想的总结.
sentences.en: A summary of my questions to Ms. C . and her responses and spontaneous associations follow.

sentences.cn: 没有人能从那个沉默的小女孩身上套出任何回答.
sentences.en: No one could elicit any response out of the reticent little girl.

sentences.cn: 太长的答案没有简洁的回答有效率,而且会引起面试官的怀疑.
sentences.en: Long answers are less effective than concise responses and tend to make interviewers suspicious.

sentences.cn: 遗憾地说, 整个的回答并不好.
sentences.en: Sadly to say, overall response was not that good.

sentences.cn: 作为对你提出的查询的答复…
sentences.en: In response to your inquiry…

sentences.cn: 感谢你对我方的询盘迅速做出的答复.
sentences.en: Thank you for your quick response to our inquiry.

sentences.cn: 也许是作为挑战式的答复,也许仅仅是心血来潮,冈扎勒士走进一所最近的大学.
sentences.en: In defiant response or perhaps just as a lark, Gonzalez walked into the closest college.

sentences.cn: 对于此工作分配的进度请求,尚未收到有关答复.
sentences.en: There has not yet been a response to the progress request for this assignment.

sentences.cn: 记者们力图把问题提得简练巧妙,以便得到一个直接的答复.
sentences.en: Reporters tried to refine their questions to draw a direct response.

sentences.cn: 你的答复只不过更表示出一种拒绝.
sentences.en: Your response just adds up to a refusal.

sentences.cn: 在答复询价时, 可寄送报价单.
sentences.en: In response to an inquiry, quotations may be sent.

sentences.cn: 我们可以研究这些答复,或许在杂志上发表这些结果.
sentences.en: We could study these response and perhaps publish the results in the magazine.

sentences.cn: 感谢您的建议,我们将尽快答复.
sentences.en: Your suggestions will be highly appreciated a prompt response will be given!

sentences.cn: 李先生在等待他的答复.
sentences.en: Mr Li is waiting for his response.

sentences.cn: 然而, 没有任何积极的意见没有被限定了否定的答复.
sentences.en: However, no positive comments were made without being qualified by a negative response.

sentences.cn: 对于大部分的学生申请,我们通常在三周内受到华盛顿的答复.
sentences.en: For most student cases we receive responses from Washington within three weeks.

sentences.cn: 你们的答复中对检验 批次 #都没有可接受的证明.
sentences.en: Your response fails to include an acceptable justification for only testing lot [ redacted ].

sentences.cn: 对于这项新的工作分配的“发布工作分配”消息,尚未收到有关答复.
sentences.en: There has not yet been a response to the Publish Assignments message for this new assignment.

sentences.cn: 对顾客提出的质量投诉,答复不超过12小时,处理不超过48小时.
sentences.en: Response to customer's complaints within 12 hrs and handle it within 48 hrs.

sentences.cn: 我今天恐怕不能给你答复.
sentences.en: I am afraid that I can not response you today.

sentences.cn: 我在等待着您的及时答复.
sentences.en: I await for your prompt response.

sentences.cn: 他不可能没有得到答复就走进房间.
sentences.en: He could not walk into a room without arousing a response.

sentences.cn: 他们对我的询问很快作了答复.
sentences.en: They make a quick response to my inquiry.

sentences.cn: 我们上周收到了来自法律部门的答复.
sentences.en: The response of legal department received us last week.

sentences.cn: 终于,从伦敦来的寄来一封信,答复了莫兰关于他年长的儿子的询问.
sentences.en: Eventually a letter arrived from London in response to Moran's inquiries about his elder son.

sentences.cn: 一位耶鲁大学管理系教授对氟勒德.斯密斯提交的论文-有关提供可靠的隔夜快递服务所做的答复.
sentences.en: Yale University management professor in response to Fred Smith's paper proposing reliable overnight delivery service.

sentences.cn: 伯恩:我想,你能否给我们的传真询价一个答复?
sentences.en: I was wondering if you would give us a response to our fax inquiry.

sentences.cn: 他的父亲期待他答复什么问题而他沉默不语的时候, 他看来仍然并不忧郁.
sentences.en: If he were silent when his father expected some response, still he didn't look moody.

sentences.cn: 很抱歉到现在才给您答复. 修正后的发票您确认下有没有问题.
sentences.en: Sorry for my late response. Here is the corrected invoice. Please check it.

sentences.cn: 也许你应该听你代理人的意见, 再花店时间考虑一下你的答复.
sentences.en: Perhaps you should heed your representation's advice. take additional time to consider your response.

sentences.cn: 对于客户的咨询和投诉应当时给予明确的答复,直到客户满意为止.
sentences.en: Provide explicit response to all inquiries and complaints until customer is totally satisfied.

sentences.cn: 如果你收到封有争论的电子邮件,试着简短的答复.
sentences.en: If you receive a flaming email try a short simple response.

sentences.cn: 退一步,然后, 每一次得到一个肯定的答复, 下一次就会更加容易得.
sentences.en: Step out and ask. Every time you get a yes response, time will be easier.

sentences.cn: 他对我的第一份备忘录的答复是闪烁其词的.
sentences.en: His response to my first memorandum was oblique.

Sentence.sentence: It is not the housing type, they found, that creates differences in residents' responses.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In response to those restrictions, grain-importing countries are trying to nail down long-term trade agreements that would lock up future grain supplies.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Even if there is no concrete benefit paid in response to your good deed, at the very least, the doer of the good deed has the opportunity to enjoy a kind of spiritually enlightened moment.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: I offer a simple proposition in response: Many of our problems—class attendance, educational success, student happiness and well-being—might be improved by cutting down the bureaucratic ( ' ,  官僚的) mechanisms and meetings and instead hiring an army of good teachers.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Rescue efforts were underway Thursday morning for 17 miners who were stuck in an elevator below ground at Cargill rock salt mine near Lansing, New York, according to Marcia Lynch, Public Information Officer at Tompkins County’s Emergency Response Department.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: These findings echo earlier research that suggests our perception of food can sometimes trick our body's response to the food itself.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Food labels may influence our body's response to food
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Millions of American families may now be in the initial stage of their responses to the current crisis, working together and supporting one another through the early months of unemployment.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: When Alex was finished, he received polite applauses, but hardly the warm response he had hoped for.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Why did Alex fail to receive the warm response he had hoped for
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: I offer a simple proposition in response: Many of our problems—class attendance, educational success, student happiness and well-being—might be improved by cutting down the bureaucratic mechanisms and meetings and instead hiring an army of good teachers.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: In response to Hurricane Katrina in 2005, USPS redirected incoming New Orleans mail to existing mail facilities in Houston.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Rescue efforts were underway Thursday morning for 17 miners who were stuck in an elevator below ground at Car gill rock salt mine near Lansing, New York, according to Marcia Lynch, Public Information Officer at Tompkins County's Emergency Response Departm
Sentence.come: 2016年12月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: The-doctors response to the question of whether or not dogs can fall in love like humans do was a straight "Of course!" He went on to say that if love is defined as a long term commitment meaning dogs seek one another out when they're apart, they're happy
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: These emails are often informative rather than personalized correspondents requiring a response or action.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: When the body realizes the muscles are hurt, the response is to increase blood flow to the area and increase body heat, damaged cells are then cleaned up and the body sends cells specially designed to break down the large muscle fiber fragments.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section C
